thread.title: BRIEF-Shanghai Fosun Plans U.S. JV, To Boost Capital Of Shanghai Biotech Firm

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Shanghai Fosun Plans U.S. JV, To Boost Capital Of Shanghai Biotech Firm

organizations.name: boost capital of shanghai biotech firm
shanghai fosun pharmaceutical group co ltd

text:
Jan 10 (Reuters) - Shanghai Fosun Pharmaceutical Group Co Ltd:
* SAYS UNIT PLANS TO INVEST $25.5 MILLION TO SET UP JV IN THE U.S.
* SAYS IT PLANS TO BOOST CAPITAL OF SHANGHAI BIOTECH FIRM BY 102 MILLION YUAN ($15.68 million) Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2ALO7nS Further company coverage: ($1 = 6.5050 Chinese yuan renminbi) (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
Our Standards: The Thomson Reuters Trust Principles.
